work in the justice system with the skills to better serve people with developmental disabilities          Honoring cadaver donors   Thursday, June 6, 2019   Undergraduate students express their gratitude during cadaver ceremony          UIC climbs to No. 3 in U.S. News Best Online Programs rankings   Tuesday, January 14, 2020   UIC was ranked No. 3 for its online bachelor’s degree programs—including health information management—in the 2020 U.S. News & World Report Best Online Programs       Recent Headlines    Taking the long view   Wednesday, April 22, 2020   Master's program Rehabilitation Sciences is now Healthspan Promotion and Rehabilitation     Two IPL researchers are named Fellows of the American Heart Association   Tuesday, April 14, 2020   Tracy Baynard and Deepika Laddu were honored for research, educational and volunteer activities related to cardiovascular diseases and stroke     UIC explores partnership with Tecnológico de Monterrey   Wednesday, April 8, 2020   A new partnership between UIC and Mexico’s leading technological university could include wellness program developed by PT     UIC opens occupational therapy clinic   Thursday, March 12, 2020   The new OT Faculty Practice works with adults experiencing chronic health conditions whose ability to participate in these daily activities is limited and with children who need extra support      All
